label: Udm: Environment
description: Groups infrastructure CIs and dictionaries and serves as a target for deployment.

properties.name: members
properties.label: Containers
properties.description: The infrastructure components of this Environment

properties.name: dictionaries
properties.label: Dictionaries
properties.description: The dictionaries providing placeholder values. If the same entry exists in multiple dictionaries, the first one in the list is taken.

properties.name: directoryPath
properties.label: Directory Path
properties.description: The directory path where the provisioned environment and provisioned configuration items will be stored.
